Title: Relates to the allocation of the funds from wireless communications surcharges imposed by a county containing a city having a population of one hundred twenty-five thousand or more persons
Summary: Relates to the allocation of the funds from wireless communications surcharges imposed by a county containing a city having a population of one hundred and twenty-five thousand or more persons.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to the allocation of the funds from wireless communications surcharges imposed by a county containing a city having a population of one hundred twenty-five thousand or more persons
